verses.roman:
brahma-sāyujya-muktera tāhā nāhi gati
vaikuṇṭha-bāhire haya tā'-sabāra sthiti

synonyms: brahma-sāyujya—of merging into the Supreme Brahman; muktera—of the liberation; tāhā—there (in Vaikuṇṭha); nāhi—not; gati—entrance; vaikuṇṭha-bāhire—outside the Vaikuṇṭha planets; haya—there is; tā'-sabāra sthiti—the residence of all of them.
translation: Those who attain brahma-sāyujya liberation cannot gain entrance into Vaikuṇṭha; their residence is outside the Vaikuṇṭha planets.
